"https://ghost.nehalist.io/content/images/2018/10/cover4-1.jpg", "width": "1000", "height": "523" }, "publisher": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "nehalist.io", "logo": { "@type": "ImageObject", Hello there!
============

I'm **Kevin**, a _late-_twenties software developer from Austria. This, **nehalist.io**, is my personal (_tech_) blog where I write about things I like and think are worthy to write about.

*   [About me](https://nehalist.io/about#about)
*   [My blog](https://nehalist.io/about#blog)
*   [My office](https://nehalist.io/about#office)
*   and

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)![Me.](./About - nehalist.io_files/me-md.jpg)

![Me.](/static/f5236b85399d64eab1f0e026af3ff27d/4fdfa/me-md.jpg)

*   [About me](https://nehalist.io/about#about)
*   [Blog](https://nehalist.io/about#blog)
*   [Office](https://nehalist.io/about#office)

About me
--------

As mentioned above my name is Kevin, born October 1990, a web- and software developer currently working full-time for [Lorem Ipsum web.solutions](https://www.loremipsum.at/) in Graz. Software development is not just my job - it's my passion. Ever since I've been a child I like to understand the _"Why?"_ and _"How?"_, hence spending (_probably way too much time_) time in front of computers trying to extend my knowledge and becoming better at whatever I do.

For more than half of my life (which equals approximately 15 years) I've been working with numerous programming languages, technologies and tools. As of today I consider myself a _full-stack developer_, mainly working with:

![Angular](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![React](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![Vue](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![TypeScript](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![JavaScript](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![SASS](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![jQuery](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

![Symfony](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![PHP](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![NodeJS](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![mySQL](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)![Electron](./About - nehalist.io_files/electron-5c4c9617237127090466ef6911e9ce47.png)

Blogging has always been a fun way to improve myself. I can't just post things I'm not certain about - every\* post requires further investigation, additional reflection and a reasonable amount of certainty in terms of quality before hitting that "Publish" button.

> If you want to master something, teach it.
> 
>  [Richard Feynman](https://twitter.com/proffeynman/status/996382321916895232)

I'm a huge fan of open source software, hence trying to contribute as much as possible. You can find all my contributions on my [GitHub profile](http://github.com/nehalist).

Outside the world of software it's likely to find me playing games, spending time with my family and friends or _trying_ to stop my cat from going insane.

\* = Mostly. If you think I'm spreading nonsense please get in touch with me and let's talk about it!

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)![placeholder](./About - nehalist.io_files/me-lg.jpg)

![placeholder](/static/96540769d7e34c79361921c49ba628ad/833c6/me-lg.jpg)

* * *

### Random Fact

Favorite tv series: Breaking Bad.

Blog
----

With my first post published somewhere in **2004** (_when I had no idea what I was doing_) my blog has gone through multiple iterations regarding its content, name and logo.

![Blog history](./About - nehalist.io_files/blog-history-001f0264c8f10bb721d225aaee6db600.png)

In its current (and hopefully last) iteration, namely **nehalist.io**, the first post was published in **2014**. Ever since it has attracted around **half a million** users and generated **more than a million** pageviews with currently between **1000 to 2000** visits **per day**.

From a custom made content management system, over WordPress and Ghost it has ultimately become a static site built on React with GatsbyJS, hosted on Uberspace. If you like the current design you can get it for free [on GitHub](https://github.com/nehalist/gatsby-theme-nehalem).

You can expect **at least two posts per month**, which are likely to be related to software development (guides, thoughts and experiences), occasionally reviews of things I use on a daily basis for my work or maybe even something different. If there's anything you'd like me to write about [just drop me a message](https://nehalist.io/contact).

Stay updated
------------

If you want to I can send you new posts per mail!

MailGet new posts per mail

_Free. No spam. Unsubscribe whenever you want._

If you do like my content subscribe to my newsletter, follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nehalist), share my blog wherever you want or feel free to [buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/nehalist) or [even a thing](https://www.amazon.de/hz/wishlist/ls/XOPS711C0NAL).

![Blog architecture](./About - nehalist.io_files/blog-arch-1bd2e8f499246d7e851c24439ce5b0b4.png)

Office
------

My very own place of unrestricted power.

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)![My office](./About - nehalist.io_files/office-lg.jpg)

![My office](/static/5811cd45c9da335812474c154b71cb19/5c271/office-lg.jpg)
